title: Questions about the new patch (Really want answers)
body:
Firstly the devourer item,when you reach 30 stacks it applies on hit effects twice, what specifically counts as an on hit effect?

For example: say i build devourer on Twisted Fate, i now have 30 stacks, my E passive will do damage on the next attack, i have a blue card ready, and my lichbane's spellblade effect will do damage on my next attack, and i have a nashors tooth.
out of all those things what will strike twice? will they all? will only the nashors? 

secondly now that slows don't stack: if i hit someone with a 99% slow for 1 second and someone else hits them with a 40% slow for 2 seconds at the same time, will:

a. only the 99% slow will apply and that target will be slowed for 1 sec

b. the target will be slowed for 99% for 1 second followed by a 1 second 40% slow

if someone could help me understand that would be great thanks :) especially if that person is a riot guy :P

replies.body:
Basically this is how it works.

1 shot on hit effects (sheen, Nasus Q like abilitys etc.) will not proc twice.
TF's E will stack twice on the attack (it won't proc twice.)
Items like Nashor's will proc twice.
